metadata.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #1 (First Print)
metadata.description:
Origin & 1st app. of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Splinter & Shredder. 
InTrove has partnered with Curio to provide a unique take on physical collectibles and the digital space, most notably NFTs. Each 1-of-1 NFT features a high resolution scan of the collectible that also represents your ownership of the physical object. To get more information on the technical aspects of the NFTs, please visit Curio.
